message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,500. I believe it provides significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  How about meeting halfway at $13,750? This reflects the product's value while acknowledging your initial offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $13,200? That's the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while.
